#labels Featured
The realease numbering scheme is a mixture of the targeted Ansys version, e. g. 14.0 and the mode version, e. g. .1 => Ansys mode version 14.0.1

===Tutorial:===

ansys-mode_tutorial.pdf is in the Download section of this site

===Installation:===

*Version 14 - 12*: Please have a look at the Emacs Wiki (http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/AnsysMode) or the accompanying README file.

*Version 11*: Please read the instructions in the source file 'ansys-mode.el'.
